name: Avalant
description:
Avalant is an Avalanche on-chain Play and Earn RPG game based on the
very efficient Tri-Token architecture and playable by anyone. The game
takes place on the anthill where 10,000 Ants NFTs work as a community to
earn real value cryptocurrencies. Join the colony by buying an Ant NFT,
start working and earn $ANTG (AntGold) salary paid by the QUEEN. Turn it
to $SUGA for energy, dig to earn more and fight bosses ðŸ‘¾.
